head.supplied: Sydney 11th July 1855. ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ Dr Mueller the Botanist attatched to the North Australian Expedition having arrived in Sydney, I am enabled to prepare a list of the stores specially required for the...

div.p: From Augustus Gregory to Edward Thomson
No. 55/7507, 4/3284 letters received, Colonial Secretary's Office, Archives Authority of New South Wales, Sydney.
For a copy of the this letter see: MS Q429 outward letter copy book, p. 77, A. C. Gregory papers, Dixson Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney. Sydney 11th July 1855.

Dr Mueller the Botanist attatched to the North Australian Expedition having arrived in Sydney, I am enabled to prepare a list of the stores specially required for the Botanical department of the Expedition, and I herewith transmit for the approval of His Excellency the Governor General, Requisitions for such items as have not otherwise been provided for.
Denison approved the request.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be

div.p: To The Honorable, The Colonial Secretary
Required for the service of the North Australian Expedition the undermentioned stores Vizt
